column4: knowledged people..please..why when i write "vdr" do i get this "bash: /usr/bin/vdr: no such file or directory" and how can i fix it?  thank u
cuz it might not be installed in /usr/bin   do a locate vdr  and see if its in /sbin or /usr/sbin  or somethin
ok... and then how can i change it to the right path
if your typing in console...just figure out whre the path is..and type the command  like   /usr/sbin/vdr  or whatever it is
